channel.title: Kombucha on Science in Progress
channel.description: Recent content in Kombucha on Science in Progress

item.title: #2 Katrina Catalano - Backyard Ecology
item.description: In episode #2 of Science in Progress I chat with Katrina Catalano a PhD candidate at Rutgers University. Katrina works out of the Pinsky lab at Rutgers University. For this episode we chat about backyard ecology projects. Katrina shares her awesome expeirence with bee keeping, composting (both out in the yard AND in the kitchen) and brewing kombucha! (n.b. I now have lots of kombucha brewing here in the “recording studio”).
